message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. I believe it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I believe it's a fair price considering the value I can get out of the product.

Bob, while I appreciate your offer, $10,500 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but $11,000 is my final offer. If you're serious about purchasing, I believe this is a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $11,000, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm offering $10,750. I believe this is a fair price for both of us.
